data.name: GitLabNG CodeUp Festival
data.description: “GitLabNG CodeUp Festival”, is our annual all-day GitLab conference in Nigeria that provides opportunity for tech speakers to speak on different topics as related to tech space and activities. data.name: IWD Ilorin
data.description:
IWD Ilorin 2020 This year we are bringing to you a remarkable and exciting International Women’s Day event geared towards women in an effort to advance their technical skills and solve issues related to creating a sustainable environment.
